Plot: A new kid must find a guy to date the meanest girl in school, the older sister of the girl he has a crush on, who cannot date until her older sister does.
Title: 10 Things I Hate About You
Actors: Heath Ledger, Julia Stiles, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Larisa Oleynik
tomatoConsensus: Julia Stiles and Heath Ledger add strong performances to an unexpectedly clever script, elevating 10 Things (slightly) above typical teen fare.
